title:
What all roles do ladies reprise in life from birth till the end of  their life?

Baby, Toddler, Child...

attachments.displayName:
What all roles do ladies reprise in life from birth till the end of  their life?

Baby, Toddler, Child,  Teenager, Girl, Friend, Sister, Lover, Lady, Woman,  Wife, Mother, Granny............

She takes any form in a man's life with care n concern. She is not brittle or candy to be light hearten. She is not a feather to be lifted by breeze or storm to swift places. She take heart, create, experience and cheer the wildest experiences, twists and turns in the journey of life.

Right from  her birth till end, she needs a soul to share her emotions.Every woman in her lifetime, is confronted by  Pains and Joys. The way she shares and get it shared bring her to limelight or dark-ling. Bonding with her Pals and  Peers, bring out the bubbles or tearing  of her emotions.

A flower is vibrant and stunning when it blossoms with its Petals. A  woman is vivacious and spirited, when surrounded with good petals- pals and peers. Every woman needs a shoulder to cry, a hands to give five, a back to tap, a lap to sleep and a legs to  tapper. To create a joyful Present and future, chuck out the daily stress n downs with the reckoning  petals of life.

Each Petal plays an important role in a flowers life. Yes, Each friend is ineluctable, she needs them, she is incomplete without them. As like a graceful  rainbow, a woman is glorious n lively in  green, only when surrounded by violet, blue, indigo, yellow, orange and Red.

Violet Petal - A counsellor, to hear, offer a profound advice for being  instrumental and shift over the sands of time. She never lectures, but will comfort  with intelligence to insults and insanity.

Blue Petal - A New Pal, to  articulate, rejoice, refresh the sparks of life. Blue is source of coolness, inspiration and motivating. So as the new Pal, to keep on faith and motivated.

Indigo Petal - A Mother at heart. After all all woman were once child to her mother. She is the one, Indigenous in anyone's life, whom anyone goes when there is a need. She embraces with her gentleness and never let u down in any heap.

Yellow Petal - A Honest Pal. She is the one who knows your grey and white shades of life . She wont Please you or judge you. Yeah, a woman needs someone whom she can rely for burning the midnight oil.

Orange Petal - A fun frolic.  Happiness unplugged and she is the one to have great moments to add energies to life.

Red Petal: A Rock stone. She is the firm, self-colored and  substantial Petal, in all your journey. Red n white, ready to fight..... Yes, she is the one to fight, quarrel, argue n work together.


CHEERS TO ALL WOMAN!!!

object.content:
What all roles do ladies reprise in life from birth till the end of  their life?

             Baby, Toddler, Child,  Teenager, Girl, Friend, Sister, Lover, Lady, Woman,  Wife, Mother, Granny............

She takes any form in a man's life with care n concern. She is not brittle or candy to be light hearten. She is not a feather to be lifted by breeze or storm to swift places. She take heart, create, experience and cheer the wildest experiences, twists and turns in the journey of life. 

Right from  her birth till end, she needs a soul to share her emotions.Every woman in her lifetime, is confronted by  Pains and Joys. The way she shares and get it shared bring her to limelight or dark-ling. Bonding with her Pals and  Peers, bring out the bubbles or tearing  of her emotions. 
 
A flower is vibrant and stunning when it blossoms with its Petals. A  woman is vivacious and spirited, when surrounded with good petals- pals and peers. Every woman needs a shoulder to cry, a hands to give five, a back to tap, a lap to sleep and a legs to  tapper. To create a joyful Present and future, chuck out the daily stress n downs with the reckoning  petals of life. 
 
Each Petal plays an important role in a flowers life. Yes, Each friend is ineluctable, she needs them, she is incomplete without them. As like a graceful  rainbow, a woman is glorious n lively in  green, only when surrounded by violet, blue, indigo, yellow, orange and Red.
 
Violet Petal - A counsellor, to hear, offer a profound advice for being  instrumental and shift over the sands of time. She never lectures, but will comfort  with intelligence to insults and insanity.
 
Blue Petal - A New Pal, to  articulate, rejoice, refresh the sparks of life. Blue is source of coolness, inspiration and motivating. So as the new Pal, to keep on faith and motivated.
 
Indigo Petal - A Mother at heart. After all all woman were once child to her mother. She is the one, Indigenous in anyone's life, whom anyone goes when there is a need. She embraces with her gentleness and never let u down in any heap.
 
Yellow Petal - A Honest Pal. She is the one who knows your grey and white shades of life . She wont Please you or judge you. Yeah, a woman needs someone whom she can rely for burning the midnight oil.
 
Orange Petal - A fun frolic.  Happiness unplugged and she is the one to have great moments to add energies to life.
 
Red Petal: A Rock stone. She is the firm, self-colored and  substantial Petal, in all your journey. Red n white, ready to fight..... Yes, she is the one to fight, quarrel, argue n work together. 
 
 
CHEERS TO ALL WOMAN!!!
